abstract: Challenged on whether his parents left Cuba before or after Castro took power, Senator Marco Rubio says of his version of events, "the essential facts of my family's story are completely accurate."
snippet: Challenged on whether his parents left Cuba before or after Castro took power, Senator Marco Rubio says of his version of events, "the essential facts of my family's story are completely accurate."
